thread.title: Top employee perks at the Best Places to Work
thread.title_full: Top employee perks at the Best Places to Work

author: Vince Brennan
title: Top employee perks at the Best Places to Work
text: 53 photos Best Places to Work From paid paternal leave and onsite fitness coaches to all-expenses paid trips around the world to celebrate sales goals or work anniversaries, the Business Journal’s Best Places to Work pull out all of the stops to encourage — and retain — employees. We asked the 47 finalists competing in the 2017 Best Places to Work Awards to tell us about their top employee perks. The results varied from the traditional, such as 401(k) matching, to the extravagant, such as beer cart Fridays.
